extendedInfo.description: Babel Rising Cataclysm is a free action game in which you can make humans tremble with the tip of your fingers!In Babel Rising Cataclysm you are God! From high above in the sky, it appears the humans are bustling aboutâ¦ and building a tower. A tower, what for? To raise themselves to your level? How conceited, how foolhardy. It is time to show these creatures the price to pay for defying God!Use your destructive powers by swiping across the screen from top to bottom, left to right, with one or more fingers. Manage your powers, enhance them, use them at the right moment, and eradicate the workers before they complete the last storey of the tower. Show them whoâs boss!Gain unlimited access to Survival mode and numerous exciting missions. Discover or rediscover a fun environment, an amazing sound track, and a series of animations that are as entertaining as ever.Not to mention even more trophies and challenges to win, scores to publish online and records to beat. Thereâs only one place in the heavens, and itâs yours!Discover the free game Babel Rising Cataclysm!Features :-          A brand-new tower with 2 different construction paths-          2 new types of enemies-          40 missions in Campaign mode-          A Survival game mode with unlimited challenges-          New powers, as well as scrolls and stelae to boost your capacities.-          Facebook/Game Center--Babel Rising Cataclysm was loved by:-  148apps.com: *4/5*http://www.148apps.com/reviews/babel-rising-cataclysm-review/#ixzz2HT51NacR- touchgen.net: *4/5*http://www.touchgen.net/babel-risingcataclysm-review--Try out our other Bulkypix games available now!- Babel Running :https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bulkypix.babelrunningpremium&hl=fr- iSlash :https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.duellogames.islash&hl=fr- Saving2 Private Sheep 2:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bulkypix.sps2&hl=fr- Kung Fu Rabbithttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bulkypix.KFR--Find the latest Bulkypix news and videos, along with all your favorite games:- Bukypix : http://www.bulkypix.com- YouTube : http://www.youtube.com/bulkypix - Twitter : https://twitter.com/Bulkypix- Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/Bulkypix- Tumblr : www.tumblr.com/tagged/bulkypix

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: Just another excuse for your usual IAP. Below-average graphics (even for 2-D standard). Mindless gameplay. Lags (BeachBuggyB run smoother). And of course, either grindings-for-weeks, or IAP. Lastly, a game as simple as this takes around 50 MBs of space? Will uninstall after submitting this.
reviews.author: Hamran Marman

reviews.title: This game
reviews.comment: Is awesome. I love this game and got to level 14 and suddenly my divine boulder stopped deploying along with me being able to do bonus levels (i tested my phones shake and tilt, wasnt the problem) still givin it 5 cause the games bomb but please FIX!!!!! I NEED TO KILLLL
reviews.author: Konner Stevens

reviews.title: Classic
reviews.comment: I like this better than the 3D one because you don\'t have to fuss with the camera controls. Basically its tower defense - or tower prevention to be literal. Its shares elements with black vs white in how you play God and \"intervene\" with mankind.. You can upgrade the plagues you send upon the workers, there\'s single use power ups, and permanent ones as well. There\'s almost no ads, no in app purchases, achievements, multiple levels with unique objectives, and survival mode.. The game offers you a lot!
reviews.author: Samuel Gerry

reviews.title: Tap the time away
reviews.comment: A fantastic tapping game; I find this to be much preferable to the similar \"Zeus Defense\" owing to the different methods available for preventing the enemies from proceeding. I will suggest playing the Survival mode to build up coins rather than spending money on them; by playing Survival and upgrading powers I was able to get quite a slew of abilities at my disposal that will surely make playing the levels MUCH easier - and it\'ll still be free.
reviews.author: Steve Warfield
